english.segment1: There must be something wrong with me. I won't stop taking chances. It's nothing to do with apathy. I can't take no for an answer. Give me a reason. Why do I do it?. Would you believe it. If I told you a lie?. Give me a reason. How could I do it?. The truth isn't easy. That much I can't deny
english.segment2: The question still remains the same. On who can I place all the blame?. The demons, devils of the world. Or is it only myself?
english.segment3: There is something definitely wrong. With all of us. It would take a miracle of God. To make things right. There is something wrong here. With all of us..
english.segment4: The answer lies in front of me. Confirmed by God's own Spirit. It's the pages that I read. How could I ever deny it?
